import React from 'react'; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import PayPalButton from "../PayPalButton"; function BasketTotals({value,history}) { const {basketSubTotal, basketTax, basketTotal, clearBasket} =value; return ( <>

Subtotal: {basketSubTotal}

VAT: {basketTax}

Total: {basketTotal}

); } export default BasketTotals;
